sprint_goal: Establish the foundational user authentication and authorization framework. An Admin can log in, create a Technician user, and both users can log in to see a UI tailored to their role.
Implement core DICOM networking. An Admin can configure a PACS connection, and any user can query that PACS and retrieve studies to the local system.
Deliver the core clinical feature: a high-performance DICOM viewer with basic manipulation tools (zoom, pan, WW/WL) and progressive loading.
Enhance system security and compliance. Implement automatic session locking and unlocking, and deliver the audit trail viewer for administrators.
